'use client'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer'; const roadmapItems = [ { phase: 'Phase 1', title: 'Launch', description: 'Token launch and initial marketing push' }, { phase: 'Phase 2', title: 'Growth', description: 'Community expansion and partnerships' }, { phase: 'Phase 3', title: 'Development', description: 'Platform development and use case implementation' }, { phase: 'Phase 4', title: 'Expansion', description: 'Global marketing and exchange listings' }, ]; export function Roadmap() { const [ref, inView] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, threshold: 0.1, }); const containerVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.2, }, }, }; const itemVariants = { hidden: { y: 20, opacity: 0 }, visible: { y: 0, opacity: 1 }, }; return (
{/* Roadmap Section */}

Roadmap

{roadmapItems.map((item, index) => (

{item.phase}: {item.title}

{item.description}

))}
{/* How to Buy Section */}

How to Buy

Step 1: Download Phantom Wallet

First, you need to download the Phantom Wallet. This is a non-custodial wallet that supports Solana and SPL tokens. It's available as a browser extension for Chrome, Firefox, and Edge, or as a mobile app for iOS and Android.

Download Phantom Wallet

Step 2: Go to a DEX

After setting up your Phantom Wallet, head to a decentralized exchange (DEX) like Serum or Raydium that supports Solana-based tokens. You will need to connect your wallet to trade tokens.

Visit Raydium

Step 3: Swap Tokens

Once you're on the DEX, search for our token (Fluffer) and swap your SOL for Fluffer tokens. Make sure to double-check the token address to avoid any potential scams.

Step 4: Add Token to Wallet

After purchasing, add the Fluffer token to your Phantom Wallet to track your balance. Go to your wallet, select 'Add Token' and paste the Fluffer token address (listed below).

{/* Token Address Section */}

Token Address

Copy the address below to add the Fluffer token to your wallet:

); }
